availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Franklin E. Congleton (Bath County, Kentucky, banker)

body.p: Bath County, Kentucky, banker. Bourbon County, Kentucky, native. Son of John N. Congleton and Molvina Congleton. Married Hanah Ceningo Congleton in Bath County, Kentucky, on December 16, 1852. Father of Elizabeth Congleton and Charles Congleton. Resident in Nicholas County in 1850. Banker in Sharpsburg in 1860. Notary public in Bath County in 1861. Banker in Bath County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas County, District 1, p. 469A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, Sharpsburg, p. 72.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas County, Carlisle, p. 278B.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994028, Bath County Marriages.
Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Nicholas County Administrators Bonds, 1854-1952, p. 367.
Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Montgomery County Wills, vol. D-F, 1828-1874, p. 195-6.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War) NARA RG 110, Bath County, KY, October 1863, p. 75.
KYR-0001-017-0179.
